unavailable.reason_english: There is no data available for the subject area of this course. This may be because we only have data for a small number of students or because we do not yet have data. This does not reflect on the quality of the course.
unavailable.reason_welsh: Nid oes data ar gael ar gyfer maes pwnc y cwrs hwn. Gallai hyn fod oherwydd bod gennym ddata ar gyfer nifer fechan o fyfyrwyr yn unig neu am nad oes gennym ddata eto. Nid yw hyn yn adlewyrchu ansawdd y cwrs.
